SEARCH
Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Model.Game
public class Game extends Object
class containing all the model objects necessary for the game. It also has the methods that will modify them. these methods can only be called by the gameController

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(List<Player> players, Queue<Card> goldDeck, Queue<Card> resourceDeck, Queue<Card> starterDeck, Queue<GoalCard> goalCardDeck, NetworkManager networkManager)

  • Method Details

    • gameEnd

      public void gameEnd()
      method that calculates the points each player made by completing both private and public goals

    • setWinners

      public void setWinners(List<String> winners)
      method that triggers the observer to send the winners
      Parameters:
      winners - list of winners

    • turnStart

      public void turnStart()
      method that starts a new turn If the game isn't ending, it will check if the player index points to an online player. If the check is true, that player will start their turn. Else, it will increase the index and make the same checks.

    • checkIfGameEnd

      public boolean checkIfGameEnd()
      method that checks if the game has to end. If this check is true, this method will change the game state and the network manager will stop reading messages and will call the gameEnd method
      Returns:
      return true if the game has to end, false otherwise

    • checkIfIsLastTurn

      public void checkIfIsLastTurn()
      Checks if the current turn is the last turn.

    • turnEnd

      public void turnEnd(String nickname)
      Ends the turn for the current player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player ending the turn.

    • playCard

      public int playCard(Card playedCard, Player player, int r, int c)
      Method that updates the model based on the card chosen by the client.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The card played by the player.
      player - The player who played the card.
      r - The row position on the board.
      c - The column position on the board.
      Returns:
      Result code indicating success or failure.

    • drawPublicCards

      public int drawPublicCards(Player player, int index)
      Draws a public card for the current player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player drawing the card.
      index - The index of the public card to draw.
      Returns:
      Result code indicating success or failure.

    • drawFromTheDeck

      public int drawFromTheDeck(Player player, int whichDeck)
      Draws a card from the specified deck for the current player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player drawing the card.
      whichDeck - The deck from which to draw the card (0 for resource deck, 1 for gold deck).
      Returns:
      Result code indicating success or failure.

    • handOutCards

      public void handOutCards(Player player, boolean updateAboutTheDecks)
      Hands out cards to the player and optionally updates observers about the deck changes.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to receive the cards.
      updateAboutTheDecks - Whether to update observers about the deck changes.

    • updatePublicCards

      Updates the public cards.

      Parameters:
